![Unpacking Interactions](interactions-unpacking.png){#fig-unpacking}

Each group in @fig-unpacking has its own intercept and slope:

| Group | Intercept           |  Slope                     |
|-------|---------------------|----------------------------|
| x = 0 | $\beta_0$           | $\beta_2$                  |
| x = 1 | $\beta_0 + \beta_1$ | $\beta_2 + \beta_3$        |
